languages.text: "Я хочу знать, почему ты так поступила. Все — от начала и до конца".

traits.locale_text: "Я хочу знать, как ты предала меня. Весь план — от начала и до конца".

languages.text: "I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."
languages.original_text: "Я хочу знать, почему ты так поступила. Все — от начала и до конца".

traits.locale_text: "I want to know how you betrayed me. The entire plan, from the beginning to end."
"I want to know how you betrayed me. The entire plan, from the beginning to end."
"I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."
"I want to know how you betrayed me. The entire plan, from beginning to end."
"I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."
"I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."
"I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."

languages.text: “我想知道你为什么要这么做。整个计划，从开始到结束，全都说清楚。”
languages.original_text: "I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."

traits.locale_text: “我想知道你是怎么背叛我的。整个计划，从开始到结束，全都说清楚。”

languages.text: «Quiero saber por qué me traicionaste. Todo, de principio a final».
languages.original_text: "I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero saber cómo me traicionó. El plan al completo, de principio a final».

languages.text: 「お前をそうさせた理由が知りたい。最初から最後まで、すべてを」
languages.original_text: "I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."

traits.locale_text: 「お前をそうさせた理由が知りたい。最初から最後まで、すべてを」

languages.text: "Ich möchte wissen, warum Ihr es getan habt. Alles, von Anfang bis Ende."
languages.original_text: "I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte wissen, wie Ihr mich verraten habt. Den gesamten Plan, von Anfang bis Ende."

languages.text: « J'exige des explications. Racontez-moi toute l'histoire, du début à la fin. »
languages.original_text: "I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux savoir comment vous m'avez {mf|trahi|trahie}. Expliquez-moi votre plan, du début à la fin. »

languages.text: "Bunu neden yaptığını bilmek istiyorum. Başından sonuna kadar her şeyi anlat."
languages.original_text: "I want to know why you did it. Everything, from beginning to end."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu neden yaptığını bilmek istiyorum. Başından sonuna kadar her şeyi anlat."
